plot: Mido is just a young, normal girl till she finds out that she comes from a blood line of sex ninjas. Now she and her little ninja buddy must stop 2 demons from opening the realm of the humans to the relm of the demons.
ending_theme: "Good-by Lonely Day" by 松崎厚美 & 高浜輝夫 (eps 1-2)
"Lost Love" by 松崎厚美 & 高浜輝夫 (eps 3-4)
"Unmei no Page" (運命のpage) by Noriko Noguchi (eps 5-6)
"運命のpage" by 野口のりこ & 高浜輝夫 (eps 5-6)
